CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 22, 1952, pg. 6, reads: "SWEARING IN TWO DEPUTY SHERIFFS - In separate swearing-in ceremonies this week, two persons were inducted into new jobs as deputy sheriffs....In the bottom photo, Sheriff Thomas E. Whitten congratulates William H. Hannon, 614 Watt Street, second from far right, on becoming a deputy sheriff as Workmen's Compensation Referee Curtis Haines, second from right, Mrs. Gladys Brown, Republican County Committeewoman from Hannon's district, and Irving Johnson, look on. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sheriff Thomas E. Whitten shaking hands with Deputy Sheriff William H. Hannon, with Curtis B. Haines second from left, Gladys Brown, and Irving Johnson on right, in office with flag and certificate on wall
